title: Japan: work and play in the land of the cherry blossom
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Geishas - Japan
description: Brief look at varius aspects of Japanese life. Narration describing aspects of the culture is accompanied by footage of coastal villages involved in fishing and pearl harvesting followed by Tokyo urbanites attending flower shows and finally concluding with a description of geishas and footage of a geisha dance.
